item.name: Authentication
item.description: APIs for user registration, login, and logout.

request.description: Logs out the authenticated user by revoking the current access token.

formdata.description: The user's email address. Must be unique.
The user's password. Must be confirmed.

request.description: This endpoint registers a new user and returns a token for authentication.
Authenticates a user and returns a token if credentials are correct.

item.name: Home Page
item.description: APIs for managing posts home page, search.

item.name: Display a paginated list of posts for the home page.
Search for users based on a query, excluding the authenticated user.

query.description: The search term for matching users by name or email.

item.name: Show the details of the post to be edited.
Create a comment for a post.

variable.description: The ID of the post comment.
The ID of the post like.

item.name: Get the users who liked a post.

variable.description: The ID of the post users like.

item.name: Store a newly created post in storage.
Update the specified post in storage.

formdata.description: The updated content of the post.

item.name: Remove the specified post from storage.
User
item.description: APIs for managing friend request, accept and reject friends , show friends.

item.name: Retrieve suggested connections for the authenticated user.
Retrieve all friend requests for the authenticated user.
Send a friend request to another user.
User Profile
item.description: APIs for managing user profile, friends, posts, and password changes.

request.description: Retrieves the profile information of a user by ID.
Retrieves the authenticated user's profile information, including their friends list and posts.
Updates the profile information of the authenticated user.
